Muelle 36

This is a very nice venue with 3 different spaces

Cubierta is a 50m2 room located at the entrance of the venue, it has beautiful windows.

El Muelle is the main room of this venue. It has 150m2 of open space very flexible and with daylight.

La Bodega is a room that can be used as chill-out area, the kitchen is in this room so, it is the perfect place to take a break and enjoy a coffee.
